attributes.action: Call a general election before the Brexit deadline of October 31st.
attributes.additional_details: The government is now claiming that a no-deal Brexit is the will of the people on the basis of a very small majority of people voting to leave the EU on unspecified terms, but after a campaign that promised we would leave with a deal. The government has failed to deliver on its promise of leaving the EU with a deal. The people should be able to hold the government to account on this issue before we leave the EU.
attributes.background: The Brexit campaign was fought on the basis that we would leave the EU with a good deal. The government is now proposing to leave the EU without a deal, leading to possible food and medicine shortages. No one voted for this and we must be given the chance to hold them to account.
